name: Cornered Spellcaster
text:
If {w}{u} was spent to cast this spell, put a blessing counter on Cornered Spellcaster.

{t}, Sacrifice Cornered Spellcaster: Add {r}{r}{r}. If it has a blessing counter, add three mana in any combination of colors instead. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell.

Summon ({X}, Discard this card: Add X mana of {w}, {u} or {r}.)
